mapper.select: select hospital_code, hospital_name, hospital_tel, hospital_address from hospitals where hospital_code=#{hospitalCode}
select hospital_code, hospital_name, hospital_tel, hospital_address from hospitals order by hospital_name desc
mapper.insert: insert into hospitals (hospital_code, hospital_name, hospital_tel, hospital_address) values (#{hospitalCode}, #{hospitalName}, #{hospitalTel}, #{hospitalAddress})
